sentences.sContent: He is studying accountancy or he is an accountancy student.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is studying accountancy or he is an accountancy student.
sentences.sCn: 他正在学习会计学或他是一名会计专业的学生。

sentences.sContent: Whether the enterprise environment is good or not has an effect on accountancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether the enterprise environment is good or not has an effect on accountancy.
sentences.sCn: 企业环境的优劣直接影响会计工作质量的高低。

synos.tran: [会计]会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

trans.tranOther: the profession or work of keeping or checking financial accounts, calculating taxes etc
